thread.title: Singer Timothy B Schmit opens up on his thirty years in The Eagles, the death of bandmate Glenn Frey and his solo career
thread.title_full: Singer Timothy B Schmit opens up on his thirty years in The Eagles, the death of bandmate Glenn Frey and his solo career

author: iwarnes3
title: Singer Timothy B Schmit opens up on his thirty years in The Eagles, the death of bandmate Glenn Frey and his solo career
text:
TV Magazine the lone eagle Singer Timothy B Schmit opens up on his thirty years in The Eagles, the death of bandmate Glenn Frey and his solo career 
As the star pens his sixth studio album, Leap of Faith, he reflects on his time in the band which dominated his life for three decades BY SIMON COSYNS
